```{r}
install.packages("NHANES")
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(NHANES)

# input data into R
data(NHANES)

# remove data we don't use
data <- subset(as.data.frame(NHANES), select = c(SurveyYr, Poverty, Age,  
                                                 Depressed, SleepHrsNight, BMI, AlcoholYear))

# round float number to integer
data$BMI<-round(data$BMI)
data$AlcoholYear<-round(data$AlcoholYear)

# removing missing value
data <- na.omit(data)

# cleaning data for restricting in Age over 18
cleaned_data <- subset(data,SurveyYr == "2009_10")
cleaned_data<-subset(cleaned_data, Age >= 18)

# Arranging data in age order
data <- cleaned_data %>% arrange(Age)

#### Save data ####
write.csv(data, "analysis_data/analysis_data.csv")
write.csv(NHANES,"analysis_data/raw_data.csv")

```
